title: Apple TV+ announces five-part docuseries on basketball phenom Makur Maker, premieres April 22
content:
Apple today announced a new docuseries on basketball’s up-and-coming star Makur Maker will debut on Friday, April 22nd exclusively on Apple TV+.

more…

The post Apple TV+ announces five-part docuseries on basketball phenom Makur Maker, premieres April 22 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple today announced a new docuseries on basketball’s up-and-coming star Makur Maker will debut on Friday, April 22nd exclusively on Apple TV+. The Makur Maker docuseries is entitled ‘The Long Game: Bigger Than Basketball’ and all five parts will debut on April 22nd. That is the same premiere date as Apple’s four-part upcoming docuseries on […]
